Translations.Text: læa brrda phu thi mi hwang ca phb rea klaw wa “chin lea ma la xik ah cung mi thuk sng lng mayang phwk rea hrux rea mi hen phracea khxng rea” nænxn phwk khea hying ya so nı taw khxng phwk khea mak læa phwk khea di lameid khxbkhet xyang mak
wan thi phwk khea hen ma la xik ah nı wan nan ca mimi khawdi sahrab brrda phu krathakhwamphid læa ma la xik ah ca klaw wa “swrrkh ca thuk ham xyang dedkhad sahrab phwk khea”
læa rea mung su swn hnung khxng kar ngan thi phwk khea di ptibati pi læw rea ca thahı man ri khunkha klay pen la xxng phu nthi pliw wxn
chawswn swrrkh nı wan nan ca xyu nı thi phanak xan di læa thiphakphxn xan sbay ying
læa wan thi thxngfa ca tæk xxk cak kxn mekh læa ma la xik ah thuk sng thyxy lng ma
Nı wan nan xanac xan thæcring pen siththi khxng phra phuthrng kruna prani læa man pen wan thi labak kæ phu ptiseth sraththa
læa wan thi phu xthrrm ca kad mux khxng khea læw ca klaw wa “xo! Tha chan di yud næwthang rwm kab xal rx su l k ca penkar di”
“xo khwam wibati kæ chan! Hak chan mi khb khn nan pen pheuxn”
nænxn khea di thahı chan hlng phid cak kar takteuxn hlangcak thi man di man mayang chan læa chay tx nmar ray nan man pen phu heyiydhyam mnusʹy semx”
læa xal rx sul di klaw wa “kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh thæcring chnchati khxng kha phraxngkh di yud xea xal kru xan ni pen thi thxdthing seiy læw”
læa chen nan hæla rea di thadi thadi mi satru phu kratha phid kæ na bi thuk khn læa phx pheiyng læw thi phracea khxng cea pen phu næa thang hi da yah læa thrng pen phu chwyhelux

læa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa klaw wa”thami xalkurxan cung mi thuk prathan lng ma kæ khea khrang deiywkan thanghmd?” Chen nan hæla pheux rea ca thahı hawcı khxng cea mankhng hnaknæn læa rea di cad hı pen pen rabeiyb reiybrxy
læa phwk khea ca mi na khx periybtheiyb(khx sngsay) dı «mayang cea wentæ rea ca di na khwam cring ma hı cea læa kar xthibay xyang di ying
brrda phu thi thuk lak hı ma chumnum kan ca chıbı hna khxng phwk khea dein pi yang nrk yahannam chn hela nan ca xyu nı sthan thi thi lew læa hlng thang ying
læa nænxn rea di prathan khamphir(tea rxd h) kæ mu sa læa rea di hı phi chay khxng khea khux ha ru n pen phu chwyhelux
læw rea di klaw wa “cea thang sxng cng xxk pi yang hmu chn thi ptiseth mi cheux xongkar thanghlay khxng rea” læa rea di thalay phwk khea xyang phinas yxyyab

læa hmu chn khxng nuh meux phwk khea ptiseth mi cheuxfang brrda rx sul rea di hı phwk khea cm natay læa rea di thahı phwk khea pen sayyan hnung kæ mnusʹychati læa rea di teriym kar lngthosʹ xyang cebpwd wi sahrab brrda phu xthrrm
Læa rea di tha lay phwk xad læa phwk sʹamud læa chaw bxna læa chnchati xik makmay rahwang nan
læa chnchati tæla smay rea di na hlakthan ma chicæng kæ khea læa chnchati tæla smay nan rea kdi thalay xyang sin sak
læa nænxn phwk khea di phan mayang hmuban sung thuk thalay doy kxn hin cak fak fa læw phwk khea mi hen man dxk hrux? Pela hrxk! Phwk khea mi hwang thi ca klab khunchiph xik tanghak
læa meux phwk khea hen cea(muhammad) phwk khea k ca mi thux xea cea pen xyang xun nxkcak pheux pen thi lxleiyn “ni hla hrux thi xallxh thrng sng ma hı pen rx sul?”

“Khea keuxb ca thahı phwk rea hlng thang pi cak(kar sakkara bucha) brrda phracea khxng rea hakwa rea mi xdthn yud man tx phracea hela nan” læa phwk khea ca ru meux phwk khea di phbhen kar lngthosʹ wa phu dı ca hlng thang kan næ
cea mi hen dxk hrux phu thi yud xea xarmn ta khxng khea pen phracea khxng khea læw cea ca pen phu khumkhrxng khea kranan hrux
hrux cea ca khid wa swn hıy khxng phwk khea ca diyin hrux chı stipayya phwk khea michı xun dı dxk nxkcak pen chen psusatw ying pi kwa nan phwk khea yang ca hlng thang seiy xik

cea midi phicarna yang(xanuphaph hæng) phracea khxng cea dxk hrux wa phraxngkh thrng phæ ngea xxk xyangri læa hak phraxngkh thrng prasngkh nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng hı man hyud ning læw rea di thahı dwng xathity pen sayyan hnung nı kar ni
læw rea di hı ngea suy sin pi yang rea thi la nxy «
læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng thahı klangkhun pen xaphrn sahrab phwk cea læa hıkar nxn penkar phakphxn læa thahı klangwan penkar kheluxnhiw
læa phraxngkh khux phu sng lm penkar na khawdi lwnghna thamklang khwam metta khxng phraxngkh læa rea di prathan na brisuththi lng ma cak fak fa
pheux rea ca hı mi chiwit dwy man (na) kæ phændin thi hænglæng læa rea ca hı sing thi rea srang man khun ma chen psusatw læa mnusʹy makmay dum man
Læa doy nænxn rea di chicæng man(xalkurxan) rahwang phwk khea pheux phwk khea ca di phicarna tæ swn mak khxng mnusʹy mi yxmrab nxkcak kar duxdung læa ptiseth
læa hak rea prasngkh nænxn rea k ca sng phu takteuxn pi yang thuk «meuxng
dangnan cea xya cheuxfang phwk ptiseth sraththa læa cng txsu dinrn kab phwk khea dwy man(xalkurxan) doy kar txsu dinrn xan ying hıy
læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng thahı thale thang sxng brrcb tid kan xan ni cud snith læa xan ni khem cad læa thrng tha thi khan rahwang man thang sxng læa thi kan khwang xan nænhna
læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng bangkeid mnusʹy cak na(xsuci) læa thrng thahı mi cheuxsay læa kherux yati læa phracea khxng cea nan pen phuthrng xanuphaph
læa phwk khea khea rph xi ba dah xun ca kxallxh sung man mi hı khun kæ phwk khea læa mi hı thosʹ kæ phwk khea læa phu ptiseth sraththa nan pen phu chwyhelux (chay txn) hı fafun phracea cxng khea
læa rea midi sng cea ma pheux xun dı nxkcak pen phu cæng khawdi læa phu takteuxn
cng klaw theid muhammad”chan midi khx kha cang cak phwk than nı kar pheyphær wentæ wa phu dı prasngkh k hı khea yud pen næwthang pi su phracea khxng khea”

læa cea cng mxbhmay tx phra phuthrng darng chiwit tlxd kal mi tay læa cng sæ s rxng sdudi dwy kar srrseriy phraxngkh læa phx pheiyng læw sahrab phraxngkh phuthrng rxbru nı khwam phid thanghlay khxng pwng baw khxng phraxngkh

phra phuthrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi mi xyu nı rahwang sxng nan nı raya wela 6 wan læw phraxngkh thrng sthity xyu bn banglangk phra phuthrng kruna prani dangnan cng tham phu ru keiyw kab phraxngkh

læa meux di thuk klaw kæ phwk khea wa “cng suyu d tx phra phuthrng prani” phwk khea di klaw wa “khır khux phra phuthrng kruna prani ca hı rea suyu d tam thi than sang rea kranan hrux?” Læa man di pheim kar han hang xxk pi kæ phwk khea
Khwam careiy ying dæ phra phuthrng thahı chan fa mi hmu dwngdaw læa di thrng thahı mi takeiyng nı nan læa dwng canthr mi sæng nwl
læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng bandal hı mi klangkhun læa klangwan hmunweiyn thænthi kan sahrab phu thi prarthna ca khırkhrwy hrux prarthna ca khxbkhun
læa pwng baw khxng phra phuthrng kruna prani khux brrda phu thi dein bn phændin dwy khwam sngbsengiym læa meux phwk khea ngo khela klaw thakthay phwk khea phwk khea ca klaw wa santi hrux sla m
læa brrda phu chı wela klangkhun tha ka rsuyud læa yun(lahmad) pheux phracea khxng phwk khea
læa brrda phu thi klaw wa “kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng rea khx phraxngkh thrng padpea kar lngthosʹ khxng nrk hı phn pi cak rea thæcring kar lngthosʹ khxng man nan man khng xyu tlxd kal
“thæcring man pen thi xyu læa thi phanak xan lew ray ying”
læa brrda phu thi meux phwk khea chı cay phwk khea k mi suruysuray læa mi trahni læa rahwang thang sxng sphaph nan phwk khea xyu say klang
læa brrda phu thi mi wingwxn khx phracea xun dı khukheiyng kab xallxh læa phwk khea mi kha chi wit sung xallxh thrng ham wi wentæ
kar lngthosʹ nı wan ki ya mah ca thuk pheim khun pen sxng thea sahrab khea læa khea ca xyu nı nan xyang xapys

wentæ phu thi klabneuxklabtaw læa sraththa læa prakxb kar ngan thi di khea hela nan hæ la xallxh ca thrng peliyn khwam chaw khxng phwk khea pen khwam di læa xallxh pen phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx
læa phu dı klabneuxklabtaw læa kratha khwam di thæcring khea klabneuxklabtaw khea ha xallxh xyang cringcang
læa brrda phu mi pen phyan nı kar thec læa meux phwk khea phan reuxng ri sara phwk khea phan pi xyang mi keiyrti
læa brrda phu thi meux thuk klaw teuxn hı raluk thung xongkar thanghlay khxng phracea khxng phwk khea phwk khea ca mi phinhlanghı pen sphaph chen khn hu hnwk tabxd

Læa brrda phu thi klaw wa “kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng rea khx phraxngkh pord prathan kæ rea sung khukhrxng khxng rea læa luk hlan khxng rea hı pen thi runrmy kæ sayta khxng rea læa thrng thahı rea pen bæbxyang kæ brrda phu yakerng”
khea hela nan ca di rab kar txbthæn nı kar thi phwk khea xdthn læa phwk khea ca di phb kar klaw kha txnrab læa sla m
doy phanak xyu nı nan xyang thawr pen thi phanak læa thi xasay thi na xphirmy thæ «

cng klaw theid “phraphupenceakhxng chan ca mi yı di tx phwk than hak mimi kar wingwxn phakdi khxng phwk than pheraa nænxn phwk than di ptiseth mi rab fang dangnan kar lngthosʹ ca keid khun xyang nænxn”
tx sin mim
hela ni khux xongkar thanghlay xan chad cæng
bangthi cea (muhammad) pen phu thalay chiwit khxng cea pheraa phwk khea mi pen phu sraththa
hak rea prasngkh rea ca hı mi sayyan hnung cak fak fa mayang phwk khea læw khx khxng phwk khea k yxm km lm tx man
læa mimi khx takteuxn hım xan dı cak phra phuthrng kruna prani wentæ phwk khea ca phinhlanghı kab man
læw nænxn phwk khea di ptiseth dangnan khawkhraw thi phwk khea khey yeaa yey man nan k ca mayang phwk khea
phwk khea midi mxng pi yang phændin dxk hrux wa kimaknxy læw thi rea di hı man ngxkngey xxk ma cak thuk chnid thi di mi prayochn
thæcring nı kar ni yxm pen sayyan hnung xyang nænxn tæ swn mak khxng phwk khea mi pen phu sraththa
læa thæcring phracea khxng cea nan nænxn phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng metta semx
læa cng raluk meux phracea khxng cea thrng reiyk mu sa wa cng pi yang hmu chn phu xthrrm
khux hmu chn khxng fir xea n phwk khea mi yakerng dxk hrux
khea (musa)klaw wa xo phracea khxng chan thæcring chan klaw wa phwk khea ca ptiseth mi yxm cheux chan
læa hawxk khxng chan ca xudxad læa lin khxng chan ca mi khlxng dangnan phraxngkh thrng pord sng ha ru nma chwy chan dwy theid
læa phwk khea mi khx kla wha tx chan dangnan chan klaw wa phwk khea ca kha chan
Phraxngkh tras wa mi dxk! Dangnan cea thang sxng cng pi theid phrxm dwy sayyan thanghlay khxng rea thæcring rea xyu kab phwk cea pen phu fang
dangnan cea thang sxng cng pi ha fir xea n læw cng klaw wa rea pen thut khxng phracea hæng sakl lok
læw khx hı sng wngswan khxng xis rx xil pi phrxm kab rea theid
khea(fir xea n) klaw wa rea midi leiyngdu cea meux khna pen dek xyu kab phwk rea dxk hrux? Læa cea di xyu kab rea hlay pi nı chwng chiwit khxng cea
læa cea di thakar kratha khxng cea sung cea di kratha pi læw læa cea pen phu hnung nı hmu phu nerkhun
khea (musa) klaw wa chan di kratha man doythi chan miru
dangnan chan di hni pi cak phwk than meux chan klaw phwk than læw phracea khxng chan di thrng prathan hi kmah kæ chan læa thrng tængtang chan hı pen rx su l khn hnung
læa ni khux buy khun thi than ra leik man tx chan doy than tha hı wngsu wan xis rx xil pen thas
fir xea n di klaw wa “læa khır khux phracea hæng sakl lok”
khea(musa) klaw wa “phracea hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi xyu nı rahwang thang sxng hak phwk than pen phu sraththa cheux man”
khea di klaw kæ phu xyu rxb «khea wa “phwk than diyin him?”
Khea(musa)klaw a “phracea khxng phwk than læa khxng brrphburusʹ smay kxn «nan dwy”
khea (fir xea n) klaw wa “th cring rx sul khxng phwk than sung di thuk sng mayang phwk than nan pen khn ba xyang nænxn”
khea(musa) klaw wa “phracea hæng this tawanxxk læa this tawantk læa sing thi xyu nı rahwang thang sxng hak phwk than chı stipayya phicarna
khea klaw wa “hak cea yudthux phracea xun cak chan chan ca hı cea xyu nı hmu phutxngkhang”
khea(musa) klaw wa “mæwa chan ca na sing thi chad cæng mayang than kranan hrux?”
Khea klaw wa “k cng na man ma si hak cea pen khncring”
dangnan khea di yon mi thea khxng khea man khux ngu xya chad cæng
Læa di dung mux khxng khea xxk ma pen si khang kæ brrda phu mxng du
khea di klaw kæ khunnang chan phu hıy rxb«khea wa “thæcring khea khn ni khux nak lenkl xyang chachxng
khea txngkar thi hı phwk than xxk cak din dæn khxng phwk than dwy leh kl khxng khea dangnan phwk than ca chinæa prakar dı”
phwk khea klaw wa “cng hnwngheniyw khea læa phi chay khxng khea wi kxn læa cng sng khn pi tam hawmeuxng hı ma chumnum kan
pheux thi nak lenkl phu chachxng thuk khn ca di ma ha than”
læw brrda nak lenkl di ma chumnum kan tam wan wela thi kahnd wi
læa di mi prakas kæ mhachn phwk than ca pi rwm chumnum dwy him
pheux phwk khea ca di tam brrda nak lenkl hak phwk khea pen phu chna
meux phwk nak lenkl ma thung phwk khea klaw kæ fir xea n wa “phwk rea ca mi rangwal nænxn hrux tha phwk rea pen phu chna
khea klaw wa “thuk læw læa phwk than khna nan ca xyu nı hmu phu kıl chid xyang nænxn”
mu sa di klaw kæ phwk khea wa “cng yon si sing thi phwk than ca txng yon”
læw phwk khea kdi yon cheuxk hlay sen khxng phwk khea læa mithea hlay xan khxng phwk khea læa phwk khea klaw wa “dwy keiy ti ys khxng fir xea n thæcring rea pen phu chna xyang nænxn”
khran læw mu sa kdi yon mithea khxng khea n badnan man di klun sing thi phwk khea di lxng man khun
phwk nak lenkl cung kmhaw lng krab suyu d
phwk khea klaw wa “rea sraththa tx phracea hæng sakl lok”
phracea khx ngmu sa læa ha run

khea klaw wa phwk than sraththa tx khea kxn thi chan ca xnuyat kæ phwk than kranan hrux? Nænxn khea txng pen hawhna khxng phwk than sung di sxn kar lenkl kæ phwk than læw phwk than ca ru nænxn chan ca tad mux khxng phwk than læa thea khxng phwk than slab khang kan læa nænxn chan ca khæwn trung wi thanghmd
phwk khea klaw wa mi penri hrxk thæcring rea nan txng pen phu klab pi yang phracea khxng rea
thæcring rea prarthna thi ca hı phracea khxng rea thrng yk thosʹ kæ rea pheraa rea penk lum ræk thi pen phu sraththa
Læ rea di dl cı hı mu sa xxk deinthang nı wela kk lang khun phrxm kan kab pwng baw khxng kha thæcring phwk cea kalang thuk tidtam
læw fir xea n di sng khn pi tam hawmeuxng tang«hı ma rwm chumnum

thæcring nı kar nan pen sayyan xyang nænxn tæ swn mak khxng phwk khea mi pen phu sraththa
læa thæcring phracea khxng cea nan nænxn phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng metta semx

khna thi khea klaw kæ bida khxng khea læa phwkphxng khxng khea wa “phwk than khearph phakdi xari?”
Phwk khea klaw wa “rea khearph phakdi rup pan læw rea ca khng pen phu yud man tx man tlxd pi”
khea(xi brxhim) klaw wa “meux phwk than wingwxn khx phwk man diyin phwk than hrux?”
“Hrux man hı khun hı thosʹ kæ phwk than him?”
Phwk khea klaw wa “tæ rea di phb brrphburusʹ khxng rea ptibati kan ma chen nan”
khea klaw wa “phwk than mi hen dxk hrux sing thi phwk than khearph phakdi xyu”
Dwy taw khxng phwk than xeng læa brrphburusʹ khxng phwk than tæ kal kxn
thæcring phwk khea khux satru khxng chan nxkcak phracea hæng sakl lok
sung phraxngkh thrng srang chan læw phraxngkh thrng chinæa thang kæ chan
læa phr xngkh thrng prathan xahar hı chan læa thrng hı na dum kæ chan
læa meux chan pwy dangnan phraxngkh thrng hı chan hay pwy
læa phuthrng hı chan tay læw thrng hı chan mi chiwit
læa phu thi chan hwang wa ca thrng xphay kæ chan sung khwam phid phlad nı wan hæng kar txbthæn

læa thrng thahı chan di rab kar raluk xyang di nı hmu chn run tx «pi

wan thi thraphysmbati læa luk hlan ca mi xanwy prayochn di ley

Khea (su lay man) yim kæm hawreaa tx kha phud khxng man læa klaw wa “kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng pord prathan kæ kha phraxngkh pheux hı kha phraxngkh khxbkhun tx khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh than sung phraxngkh than di thrng pordpran kæ kha phraxngkh læa bida marda khxng kha phraxngkh læa hı kha phraxngkh kratha khwam di pheux hı phraxngkh thrng phx phrathay man læa thrng hı kha phraxngkh khea xyu nı khwam metta khxng phraxngkh nı hmu pwng baw khxng phraxngkh thi di thanghlay”
læa khea di trwc du fung nk læw klaw khun wa “thami chan cung mi hen hud hud tæwa man hay pi hin
“nænxn chan ca lngthosʹ man dwy kar lngthosʹ xyang sahas hrux chan ca kha man xyang nænxn hrux hı man na hlakthan xan chad cæng ma hı chan”

“chan di phb hying khn hnung pkkhrxng phwk khea læa nang mi thuk sing læa nang mi ballangk xan hıy to”

“læa chan di phb nang læa hmu chn khxng nang sakkara bucha dwng xathity xun ca kxallxh læa mar chay dxn di thahı kar ngan khxng phwk khea pen khxngdi ngam kæ phwk khea læa di kidkan phwk khea xxk cak næwthang thi thuk txng dangnan phwk khea cung mi di xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng”
thami phwk khea mi suyu d tx xallxh phuna xxk ma sung sing thi sxn ren xyu nı chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa thrng rxbru sing thi phwk cea pidbang læa sing thi phwk cea peidphey
xallxh mimi phracea xun dı nxkcak phraxngkh phracea hæng ballangk xan ying hıy
khea klaw wa “rea ca khxy du wa cea phud cring hrux cea xyu nı hmu phu klaw thec”

(Phra rachini) thrng klaw wa “xo hmu briphar thanghlay xey! Næthæ sar xan mi keiyrti thuk na ma hı chan”
“Thæcring man ma cak su lay man læa thæcring man reim wa dwy phranam khx ngxallxh phuthrng kruna prani phuthrng metta semx”
“phwk than xya yexhying tx chan læa cng ma ha chan xyang nxbnxm”
phranang thrng klaw wa “xo hmu brihar thanghlay xey! Cng hı khx chikhad kæ chan nı reuxng khxng chan chan mi xac ca tadsincı nı kickar dı cnkwa phwk than ca xyu rwm dwy”

phwk khea klaw wa “rea pen phwk thi mi phlang læa pen phwk thi mi kalang rb khem khæng sahrab phra baycha nan pen khxng phranang dangnan phranang di pord truktrxng du sing dı thi phranang ca thrng baycha”
phranang thrng klaw wa “thæcring hela ksʹatriy nan meux kheapi nı meuxng dı k thalay man læa thahı brrda phu mi xanac khxng meuxng nan pen phu tatxy læa chen nan hæla phwk khea kratha kan”
“læa thæcring chan ca sng khxngkanal pi hı phwk khea læw chan ca feakhxy du wa phu thi thuk sng pi nan ca klab ma xyangri?”

Meux phwk khea di khea phb su lay man læw khea(su lay man) klaw wa “phwk than ca na thraphysin ma kanal kæ rea hrux? Sing thi xallxh thrng prathan hı kæ channan di ying kwa sing thi phraxngkh prathan hı kæ phwk than tæ phwk than dicı tx khxngkanal khxng phwk than

khea (su lay man) klaw wa “xo hmu briphar thanghlay xey! Phu dı nı hmu phwk than ca na ballangk khxng nang mayang chan kxn thi phwk khea ca ma ha chan xyang phu nxbnxm”

phu pricha samarth laleis khn hnung khxng phwk yin di klaw wa “chan ca na man ma senx than kxn thi than ca luk khun cak thinang khxng than læa thæcring chan pen phu mi phlang læa wi wangcı di nı reuxng ni”

Phu thi mi khwam ru nı reuxng khamphir klaw wa “chan ca na man ma senx than chaw phribtadeiyw” meux khea (su lay man) hen man wang mankhng xyu txhna khea khea klaw wa “ni neuxngcak khwam pordpran khxng phracea khxng chan pheux phraxngkh ca di thrng thdsxb chan wa chan ktayyu hrux nerkhun læa phu dı ktayyu thæcring khea k ktayyu tx taw khea xeng læa phu dı nerkhun thæcring phracea khxng channan pen phuthrng mangmi phuthrng xeuxfeux pheuxphæ ying”
khea klaw wa “phwk than cng dadpælng ballangk khxng phranang pheux du si wa phranang ca ca man di hrux phranang ca xyu nı hmu phu ca man mi di”

khran meux phranang di ma thung kdi thul phranang wa “ballangk khxng phranang hemuxn xyang ni hrux?” Phranang tras wa “man khlay xyang ni hæla” læa rea di rab khwam ru ma kxn nang læa rea di pen muslim ma kxn nang

di miseiyng klaw kæ nang wa “pord kheapi nı wang theid” khran meux nang hen man nang khid wa man pen sra thi pen hwng na læa nang di leik hna khæng khxng nang khea (su lay man) klaw wa “man pen wang thahı rabreiyb dwy kra cak” nang di klaw wa “kha tæ phracea khxng chan thæcring chan di xthrrm kætaw chan xeng læa chan khxn xb nxm ptibati tam su lay man pheux xallxh phracea hæng sakl lok”

Phwk khea klaw wa “phwk rea di prasb chokh ray pheraa than læa phu thi rwm kab than” khea (sx læa h) klaw wa “chokh ray khxng phwk than xyu thi xallxh ying kwa nan phwk than pen hmu chn thi thuk thdsxb”
